description: Yes, you can. Once you hit the 'Create' button after adding required media, you will be able to preview your video by clicking on 'Generate Preview' in the finalize screen. However, the preview will be comparatively of lower quality than the actual video.
description_text: Yes, you can. Once you hit the 'Create' button after adding required media, you will be able to preview your video by clicking on 'Generate Preview' in the finalize screen. However, the preview will be comparatively of lower quality than the actual video.
title: Can I preview the video prior to creation?
